title: Badminton World Championships: Satwik-Chirag, Treesa-Gayatri through to doubles third round
content:
Indiaâ€™s doubles pairs of Satwiksairaj Rankireddy-Chirag Shetty and Treesa Jolly-Gayatri Gopichand on Wednesday reached the third round in the menâ€™s and womenâ€™s doubles event respectively at the ongoing BWF World Championships in Copenhagen, Denmark.Second seeds Rankireddy and Shetty needed just 30 minutes to get past the Australian pair of Kenneth Choo and Ming Lim. The Indians won 21-16, 21-9 to set up a third-round clash against Indonesiaâ€™s 10th seeds Leo Rolly Carnando and Daniel Marthin. In their only previous meeting, Rankireddy and Shetty prevailed in three games at the 2023 Japan Open.In the womenâ€™s doubles draw, 15th seeds Jolly and Gopichand secured a comfortable win in the second round against Chinese Taipeiâ€™s Chang Ching Hui and Yang Ching Tun. The Indian won 21-18, 21-10 in a 38-minute match.Jolly and Gopichand will next face top seeds and defending champions Cheng Qing Chen and Jia Yi Fan.
